item.title: Power Optimization Techniques
item.description: Techniques to optimize design power Clock tree optimization and clock gating: Portions of the clock tree(s) that arenâ€™t being used at any particular time are disabled. Operand isolation: Reduce power dissipation in datapath blocks controlled by an enable signal; when the datapath element is not active, prevent it from switching. Logic restructuring: Move high switching operations up in the logic cone, and low switching operations back in the logic cone; a gate-level dynamic power optimization technique.
